quotes.text:
What do you think they're going to do to us when they find us guilty?" she says after a few minutes of silence have passed.
"Honestly?"
"Does now seem like the time for honesty?"
I look at her from the corner of my eye. "I think they're going to force us to eat lots of cake and then take an unreasonably long nap.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.text: I saw the world I had walked since my birth and I understood how fragile it was, that the reality was a thin layer of icing on a great dark birthday cake writhing with grubs and nightmares and hunger.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: Here's a basic difference between Morelli and me. My first thought was always of cake. His first thought was always of sex. Don't get me wrong. I like sex . . . a lot. But it's never going to replace cake.
quotes.author: Janet Evanovich

quotes.text: If I was made of cake I'd eat myself before somebody else could.
quotes.author: Emma Donoghue

quotes.text: Love is like a good cake; you never know when it's coming, but you'd better eat it when it does!
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text:
I tried to explain as much as I could," Poppet says. "I think I made an analogy about cake."
"Well, that must have worked," Widget says. "Who doesn't like a good cake analogy?
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.text:
You never know. Say the arena's actually a giant cake-"
"Say we move on," I broke in.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.text: Cake for later, cake as a way of life.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.text:
In Britain, a cup of tea is the answer to every problem.
Fallen off your bicycle? Nice cup of tea.
Your house has been destroyed by a meteorite? Nice cup of tea and a biscuit.
Your entire family has been eaten by a Tyrannosaurus Rex that has travelled through a space/time portal? Nice cup of tea and a piece of cake. Possibly a savoury option would be welcome here too, for example a Scotch egg or a sausage roll.

quotes.text: Cake is happiness! If you know the way of the cake, you know the way of happiness! If you have a cake in front of you, you should not look any further for joy!
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: But I'm really enjoying my retirement. I get to sleep in every day. I do crossword puzzles and eat cake.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.text: To buy a cake... to howl at the moon... to know true happiness... I am happy.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text:
Mma Ramotswe sighed. 'We are all tempted, Mma. We are all tempted when it comes to cake.'
That is true,' said Mma Potokwane sadly. 'There are many temptations in this life, but cake is probably one of the biggest of them.
quotes.author: Alexander McCall Smith

quotes.text: If you wait for a cake to be given to you so you will be happy- then you will be happy when someone gives you a cake. But if you buy a cake (or bake one) for yourself so you will be happy, you have found the way of happiness.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: But how will I eat cake if my head is over there, and my hands are over here?
quotes.author: Marie Antoinette

quotes.text: I got out on the street and started crying the kind of hysterical tears made justifiable only by turning off one’s cell phone, putting it to the ear, and pretending to be told of a death in the family.
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.text:
I suppose I wanted to have my cake and eat it.
But then again, what were you going to do with your cake if not eat it?
Frame it?
Use it as a sachet in your underwear drawer?
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.text: It baffles me that people think that obliterating the past will save them from its consequences, as if throwing away the empty cake plate would help you lose weight.
quotes.author: Timothy B. Tyson

quotes.text:
My favourite food is cake.
What kind of cake?
It doesn't matter. All cake.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.text: The first year was like icing. Then the cake started to show through …
quotes.author: John Ashbery

quotes.text: That cake tasted good. But the cake in the garbage tasted better. It was the best cake I ever ate.
quotes.author: Loretta Ellsworth

quotes.text: If you're going to lick the icing off somebody else's cake you won't be nourished and it won't do you any good,--or you might find the cake had caraway seeds and you hate them.
quotes.author: Emily Carr

quotes.text: I'm going to die. And as if that weren't bad enough, I'm going to die inside a cake.
quotes.author: Peter H. Fogtdal

quotes.text: I think they're going to force us to eat lots of cake and then take an unreasonably long nap.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.text: Those dripping crumpets, I can see them now. Tiny crisp wedges of toast, and piping-hot, flaky scones. Sandwiches of unknown nature, mysteriously flavoured and quite delectable, and that very special gingerbread. Angel cake, that melted in the mouth, and his rather stodgier companion, bursting with peel and raisins. There was enough food there to keep a starving family for a week.

quotes.text:
Destiny cuts
the cake of love,
Three slices to some,
To others, a crumb.
quotes.author: Stefano Benni

quotes.text: The area was encompassed in a bubble of warm, fragrant steam from the funnel cake deep fryers. It smelled like sweet vanilla cake batter you licked off a spoon.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.text: Cake is for the weak,” Mom always says. Funny, I thought it was for birthdays.
quotes.author: Danielle Joseph

quotes.text: Birthday Soup is good to eat, but not as good as Birthday Cake.
quotes.author: Else Holmelund Minarik

quotes.text: foodstuffs absolved of the obligation to provide vitamins and minerals cavorted with reckless abandon.
quotes.author: Michael Lewis

quotes.text:
His father is out cutting wood, so he goes to his mother.
'Mother, I must away and see the world, or I shall go mad.'
Says his mother, 'If you must go, go you must, and God go with you! I will bake you a cake. Will you have a little cake with my blessing, or a big cake with my cursing?'
Says Jack, 'Make me a big cake, mother. It will last longer.'
His mother makes him a big cake, and he sets out. And she is standing on the roof of the house, calling curses after him as far as she can see him.
quotes.author: Ruth Manning-Sanders

quotes.text: Someone once said that there are always flowers for those who want to find flowers. I think that's true. But I also think that there are always cakes for those who want to find cakes.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: Jetzt eine Pizza, niemand kann tagelang Streuselkuchen essen.
quotes.author: Lilly Axster

quotes.text: Before she cut her birthday cake, she cast a wish, then blew the candles out from his eyes.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.text: The town called her Buttercake in honor of her sweet cheeks and not the ones on her face.
quotes.author: Amy LaBonte

quotes.text:
The Lion and the Unicorn were fighting for the crown:
The Lion beat the Unicorn all around the town.
Some gave them white bread, some gave them brown:
Some gave them plum-cake and drummed them out of town.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.text: I long ago came to the understanding that the problems I once had with food were not merely about food. Eating was a way of trying to fill up the emptiness, to provide comfort. It was a substitute for love. I'm not referring to the love that comes from someone else. The love that was missing from my life was self-love. With age I've discovered a sense of worth that makes me less hungry. A piece of cake is just a piece of cake.
quotes.author: Valerie Harper

quotes.text: Knowledge may be power, but cake has great bargaining properties
quotes.author: Julia Seitz

quotes.text: We must stop calling the looting of our national wealth, a share in the national cake.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.text:
My stomach rumbles.
Plates of cookies, cake, and fudge.
Christmastime is here.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.text: Cut cakes, not wrists
quotes.author: Troye Sivan

quotes.text: Nothing in life is a piece of cake; well, except an actually piece of cake.
quotes.author: Hiba Fatima Ahmad

quotes.text: A sweet wedding cake does not guarantee a sweet marriage.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.text: J'ai toujours fait des gâteaux. Parce que sinon, la vie était trop dure. Faire des gâteaux, c'était un défi, et un combat.
quotes.author: Durian Sukegawa

quotes.text: Now that we know about his indigestion, we can torture him with cake.
quotes.author: Kristin Cashore

quotes.text: I saved him a piece. Okay, a small piece. But I felt better after eating the cake and if he cared for me as much as he said he did, he'd want me to have it. So I ate his piece, too.
quotes.author: Celia Jerome

quotes.text:
Mandy, I hardly think this was appropriate, not after… you know… after the funeral we haven’t had the money for any of your weird little games and I was hoping you’d be more mature now that Jud’s gone,” her father had disappointedly added. “How much’d that cake cost you?”
“It’s paid for,” Mandy had argued, but her voice had sounded tiny in the harbour wind. “I used the cash from my summer job at Frenchy’s last year and I… it was my birthday, dad!”
“You can’t even be normal about this one thing, can you?” her father had complained.
Mandy hadn’t cried, she’d only stared back knowingly, her voice shaky. “…I’m normal.
quotes.author: Rebecca McNutt

quotes.text:
After many years the woman died, of natural causes. And a few years after that, the ogre died. Eventually, his mistresses died, down on the ground, in the people village, over decades. The war men and women died. The human girl who had escaped her early death died, across the land, over by the ocean, in her shack of blue bowls and rocking chairs. The witch, who had originally made the cake and made up up the spell and given it as a gift to her beloved ogre friend, died. 
The cake went on and on. Time passed...
And the cake, always wanting to please, the cake who had found a way to survive its endlessness by recreating its role over and over again, tried to figure out, in its cake way, what this light-dappled object might want to eat. So it became darkness, a cake of darkness. It did not have to be human food. It did not have to be digestible through a familiar tract. It lay there on the dirt, waiting, a simmering cake of darkness. Through time, and wind, and earthquakes, and chance. At last the cloak fell out of the tree and blew across the land and happened upon the cake where it ate its darkness and extinguished its own dappled light. The cloak disappeared into night and was not seen again, as it was only a piece of coat shaped darkness now and could not be spotted so easily, had there been any eyes left to see it. It floated and joined with nowhere. 
Darkness was overtaking everything, anyway, pouring over the land and sky. The cake itself, still in the shape of darkness, sat on the hillside. 
'What's left?' said the cake. 
It thought in blocks of feeling. It felt the thick darkness all around it. 
'What is left to eat me, to take me in?'
Darkness did not want to eat more darkness, not especially. Darkness did not care for carrot cake, or apple pie. Darkness did not seem interested in a water cake or a cake of money. Only when the cake filled with light did it come over. The darkness circling around the light, devouring the light. But the cake kept refilling, as we know. This is the spell of the cake. And the darkness eating light, and again, light, and again, light, lifted.
quotes.author: Aimee Bender

quotes.text: Oh my dear. When has cake ever been for hunger? It's for flavor, and, in this case, comfort.
quotes.author: Meena van Praag

quotes.text:
Have you never had cake before?' he asks me.
I get nervous. Is cake a really human thing? Does everybody eat it? Would it show me up as a stranger if I say no?
quotes.author: Laura Dockrill

quotes.text: Stop fretting and eat your Madeira Cake..
quotes.author: Diane Samuels

quotes.text: Intelligence is the icing, but wisdom is the cake.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.text:
Mia stayed where she was, distrust plain in her eyes.
"I've got tea," Mercurio sighed. "And cake."
The girl covered her growling belly with both palms.
". . . What kind of cake?"
"The free kind."
Mia pouted. Licked her lips and tasted blood.
"My favorite."
And she took the old man's hand.
quotes.author: Jay Kristoff

quotes.text: We must have a pie. Stress cannot exist in the presence of a pie.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.text: You can tell a lot about a fellow's character by his way of eating jellybeans.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: Look, there's no metaphysics on earth like chocolates.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.text: I'm not a vegetarian! I'm a dessertarian!
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: I hope there's pudding!
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.text: I've never met a problem a proper cupcake couldn't fix.
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler

quotes.text: He looks at you like you’re crème brûlée.
quotes.author: Kelly Moran

quotes.text: The 12-step chocoholics program: Never be more than 12 steps away from chocolate!
quotes.author: Terry Moore

quotes.text: If you are not feeling well, if you have not slept, chocolate will revive you. But you have no chocolate! I think of that again and again! My dear, how will you ever manage?
quotes.author: Marie de Rabutin-Chantal de Sévigné

quotes.text: There are two kinds of people in the world: those who love chocolate, and communists.
quotes.author: Leslie Moak Murray

quotes.text: I am starting to think that maybe memories are like this dessert. I eat it, and it becomes a part of me, whether I remember it later or not.
quotes.author: Erica Bauermeister

quotes.text: Just about every available female--and some unavailable--seemed to think the way to his heart was through his blood sugar levels.
quotes.author: Kelly Moran

quotes.text:
But I, when I undress me
Each night, upon my knees
Will ask the Lord to bless me
With apple-pie and cheese.
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.text: Dessert without cheese is like a beauty with only one eye
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.text: Some people prefer eating dessert to the main course. These people have never been really hungry.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.text: If you want to grow up to be a big, strong pea, you have to eat your candy," Papa Pea would say.
quotes.author: Amy Krouse Rosenthal

quotes.text: I should have asked why any room in the house was better than home to me when she entered it, and barren as a desert when she went out again—why I always noticed and remembered the little changes in her dress that I had noticed and remembered in no other woman’s before—why I saw her, heard her, and touched her (when we shook hands at night and morning) as I had never seen, heard, and touched any other woman in my life?
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.text:
I wasn't going to have dessert, but it was right there, all gooey and sweet. It's like sex. I mean, when it's right there, what are you supposed to do? I wasn't going to have that either--sex--with my parents bunking in the office, but, well, it was right there."
"I'll tolerate the gooey and sweet, Peabody, but I'm not thinking about you having sex with McNab, especially in the same sentence as 'my parents.'"
"I think they had sex, too."
Eve struggled not to wince or twitch. "Do you want me to kick you down four flights of steps and make you walk up again?"
"I'd probably bounce all the way down, too, with all this gooey and sweet in my butt. So I guess not."
"Good choice.
quotes.author: J.D. Robb

quotes.text: Sure I eat my feelings, but I save the emotional roller coaster for dessert
quotes.author: Josh Stern

quotes.text: Life is like an 6-slice apple pie at a 12-guest dinner banquet. If you just sit back and wait for it to come to you, chances are, you're going to miss dessert.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.text: What goes on between a man and his missus is nobody's business; especially where desert toppin's involved.
quotes.author: Tanya Huff

quotes.text: If that's the case, waiter, please bring me another piece of cake," Gramps said as lunch was brought to the table, "I'm all for fighting tyranny and oppression.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.text: Only those who will love longer than they expected to can truly love pecan pie, which doesn't explain its status as death rows most requested last dessert, or why chopped pecans, corn syrup, directions from the Karo bottle's cherry-red side are what mercy taste like to some. But there you have it.
quotes.author: Kate Lebo

quotes.text: In the middle of a dessert, no one talks about the virtues of the Sun!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.text: Death is a poison parsley on a dessert wine.
quotes.author: Chirag Tulsiani

quotes.text: Life's short. Eat dessert first, work less and vacation MORE!!
quotes.author: Lea Mishell

quotes.text:
There are two kinds of women in the world: those who savor, and those who don’t. The ones who savor know how to enjoy a good time when it happens. We dig in the claws and ride a rush as hard and as long as we can.
And then there are those other gals. I don’t know if they feel guilty about having fun or if they take themselves too seriously—or maybe they’re just afraid they’ll get their hair mussed if they throw their head back and have a good time. Whatever it is, they’ll push back from the table at d’Annunzio’s, still flushed from some masterpiece of chocolate-raspberry bliss, and their first words uttered will involve 'walking it off.
quotes.author: Chris Dee

quotes.text: Dessert was an over baked chocolate chip cookies the size of a hockey puck and just about as tasty.
quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

quotes.text: Dessert is to a meal what a dress is to a woman.
quotes.author: Béatrice Peltre

quotes.text: Life is short. Eat dessert first.
quotes.author: Ernestine Ulmer

quotes.text:
When I'm not longer rapping, I want to open up an ice cream parlor and call myself Scoop Dogg. 
Snoop Dogg.
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.text: The only way cheese is dessert is when it's followed by the word cake.
quotes.author: Michele Gorman

quotes.text:
I know one thing about the place I came from,' I say. 'We didn't eat dessert.'
'Then you came from a horrible and backward place and must stay here out of self-preservation.
quotes.author: Josin L. McQuein

quotes.text: As one who appreciated the tragic side of eating, it seemed to him that anything other than fruit for dessert implied a reprehensible frivolity, and cakes in particular ended up annihilating the flavour of quiet sadness that must be allowed to linger at the end of a great culinary performance.
quotes.author: Manuel Vázquez Montalbán

quotes.text: And when all of the flourless chocolate cakes & chocolate mousse or ganache cakes have come and gone, there will still be nothing like a fudgy brownie, dry & crackled on top, moist & dense within, with a glass of cold milk.
quotes.author: Richard Sax

quotes.text: If the second date seems to be going well, it's pretty much a given that by dessert I'll renounce my faith
quotes.author: Josh Stern

quotes.text: I was thinking of murder, mutilation and dessert like Ignacia Sandoval’s instructions for delectable empanadas made of minced mother-in-law’s tongue (said to induce peace and harmony in your household), or the gonads of your cheating husband (a savory dish to add spice to your lovemaking).
quotes.author: Sandra Ramos O'Briant

quotes.text: Number of empty Ben & Jerry's containers: 3 -- two mint chocolate cookie, one plain vanilla. (Who buys plain vanilla ice cream from Ben & Jerry's, anyway? Is there a greater waste?)
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.text: Like magic, she felt him getting nearer, felt it like a pull in the pit of her stomach. It felt like hunger but deeper, heavier. Like the best kind of expectation. Ice cream expectation. Chocolate expectation.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.text: ... everyone knows that ice cream is worth the trouble of being cold. Like all things virtuous, you have to suffer to gain the reward.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.text: Forget art. Put your trust in ice cream.
quotes.author: Charles Baxter

quotes.text: Without ice cream, there would be darkness and chaos.
quotes.author: Don Kardong

quotes.text: Have you ever spent days and days and days making up flavors of ice cream that no one's ever eaten before? Like chicken and telepone ice cream? Green mouse ice cream was the worst. I didn't like that at all.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text:
This one is called "Chunky Munky".' Nadia stopped with the spoon halfway to her mouth. 'But isn´t a monkey a small chattering Earth creature that lives in trees?' she asked faintly. 'Are ... are you telling me I´m eating chunks of its flesh?' 
'Ugh.' Sophia shivered. 'What a thought! The poor monkeys!'
Nadia felt ill. 'Is that why this stuff is called 'I Scream?' Because the animal screams when they make it into dessert?
quotes.author: Evangeline Anderson

quotes.text: ...stop pacing the aisles and counting the miles. Instead, climb more mountains, eat more ice cream, go barefoot oftener, swim more rivers, watch more sunsets, laugh more and cry less. Life must be lived as we go along.
quotes.author: Robert J. Hastings

quotes.text: [I]t was the color of someone buying you an ice cream cone for no reason at all.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: There were some problems only coffee and ice cream could fix.
quotes.author: Amal El-Mohtar

quotes.text: If your arteries are good, eat more ice cream. If they are bad, drink more red wine. Proceed thusly.
quotes.author: Sandra Byrd

quotes.text:
Personally, I like to mix and match--I prefer to get a couple of milk shakes, a banana split ... a sundae or two. Then I top it off with a mocha chip in a cone. I don't know why. I guess that's like the dinner mint at the end of a meal to me. Know what I mean?"
Mary had to turn around again. Bitty was looking forward, her brows super-high, her little face the picture of surprise.
"He's not kidding," Mary murmured. "Even if you're not into the ice cream, watching him eat all that is something to see.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.text: That was the best ice-cream soda I ever tasted. (Last words.)
quotes.author: Lou Costello

quotes.text: I hope your only rocky road is chocolate.
quotes.author: Amanda Mosher

quotes.text: So... Italian gelato. Take the deliciousness of a regular ice-cream cone, times it by a million, then sprinkle it with crushed-up unicorn horns.
quotes.author: Jenna Evans Welch

quotes.text:
The Ice Cream Cone Charm
You Will Never Work A Day Once You Discover A Passion That Makes Your Life Rich & Sweet
quotes.author: Viola Shipman

quotes.text: At the end of the day, the argument between spirituality and about spirituality, is all against the nature of spirituality. In arguing spirituality, we go against its very nature. The important question: “Am I being kind in what I am saying/doing”? And that is all. In all truth, to eat an ice cream cone and to smile with the joy of a child, is about a billion times more spiritual of an activity, than to discuss views about spirituality. The experience of innocence; the experience of joy—this edifies ourselves and others. And that is spirituality. An ice cream cone can be the most spiritual object in the universe, at any given time.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: Abby wouldn't want you to suffer because of some jerk that kidnapped her. She would want you to go on your trip so that she would have fun torturing you for not being a puddle on the ground with a box of tissues and an empty gallon of ice cream by your side. Then afterwards to hit you for thinking she was seriously hoping you would be doing that.
quotes.author: Ottilie Weber

quotes.text:
-"What's that for?"
-"Have a little bread with your ice cream," she told me.
quotes.author: Astrid Amara

quotes.text: Does the word "ice cream" taste as good as ice cream? Not even the poets think so.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.text:
We grew up on the same street,
You and me.
We went to the same schools,
Rode the same bus,
Had the same friends,
And even shared spaghetti
With each other's families.
And though our roots belong to
The same tree,
Our branches have grown
In different directions.
Our tree,
Now resembles a thousand
Other trees
In a sea of a trillion
Other trees
With parallel destinies
And similar dreams.
You cannot envy the branch
That grows bigger
From the same seed,
And you cannot
Blame it on the sun's direction.
But you still compare us,
As if we're still those two
Kids at the park
Slurping down slushies and
Eating ice cream.
Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun (2010)
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.text: A dessert to a deserter in the desert burst, "You trust your thirst. And you are too hot! You scream for ice cream. And believe it or not, I may not be your first. But I might be your lust! Give it a shot...
quotes.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.text:
Starla, when you work in a restaurant, it’s not called ‘pie with ice cream on top.’ It’s called pie a la mode. Try saying it one time.”
“A-la-mo,” she pronounced.
“There’s a good girl,” Darius said, grinning. “The next time you ask a customer if he wants some dessert, you ask him if he wants pie Alamo.
quotes.author: Erin O'Riordan

quotes.text: ... o zi fără înghețată era o zi pierdută.
quotes.author: Iain Pears

quotes.text: There is a tray full of glass sundae dishes filled with brightly colored ice cream. Strawberry, pistachio, black raspberry. Pink, green, and purple. I like the colors next to each other and wonder what kind of impossible things I can draw about ice cream. Maybe melting rivers of it. And a man with a cone-shaped head sitting in a babana split dish rowing with a spoon.
quotes.author: Lynda Mullaly Hunt

quotes.text: Stop talking," she said boldly as she closed the distance between them until they were touching. "We can walk to the bedroom or you can carry me but if you don't decide soon I may just go insane.
quotes.author: Samantha Chase

quotes.text: Do you have any idea how badly I want to pick you up and carry you into my bedroom and make love to you?
quotes.author: Samantha Chase

quotes.text:
You did not sell nor wanted to buy me Ice cream.
You gave me my most favourite flavour.
Petra Hermans
quotes.author: Petra Hermans

quotes.text: Each boat-shaped dish held scoops of vanilla and chocolate ice cream beneath thick blankets of chocolate syrup and creamy marshmallow sauce. Mounds of whipped cream rose on top, with a juicy red maraschino cherry at the very peak. Crunchy cookies poked like wings from each side.
quotes.author: Shirley Parenteau

quotes.text:
She ran her hands under his shirt, over his chest, her cool
touch igniting shivers over his skin. “Is this a ploy to get another song out of me?” she asked.
“It’s a ploy to get you out of your pants.”
“And what, exactly, are you planning on doing once you get
me out of my pants?”
Will felt his lips curving up again. “Darlin’, you leave the
details to me.
quotes.author: Jamie Farrell

quotes.text:
You really do hate me, don't you? I mean, destroying someone's ice-cream cone? That's vicious."
Her cheeks reddened. "I didn't see you there. Honestly." She wiped at his shirt more frantically, as if she could prevent it from staining if she rubbed hard enough.
"Oh, now I see your plan, and it's far more devious than I thought." Daniel smirked. "You were looking for an excuse to grope me.
quotes.author: Amanda Hocking

quotes.text: Frozen yogurt is tastier than ice cream, nobody is too old for cartoons, bald men are sexy, chocolate is the best medicine, BIG books are better, cats secretly rule the planet, and everything should be available in the color pink, including monster trucks.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.text:
Okay, if this is what falling in love feels like, someone please kill me now. (Not literally, overzealous
readers.) But it was all too much—too much emotion, too much happiness, too much longing, perhaps
too much ice cream…
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.text: I'm not even going to tell you what I think about what just happened in there. But I know it sucked and I have no idea why you aren't crying right now, but I know your heart hurts, and maybe even your pride. So fuck school. We’re going for ice cream.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.text: Falling in love for the first time is a completely transcendent experience. It’s like eating pizza-flavored ice cream. Your brain can’t even process that level of joy. Love makes people do crazy things like kill other people or shop at Crate & Barrel. I think on some level it makes us all delusional. Deep down, our whole lives, no matter how low our self-esteem gets, we think, I have a special skill that no one knows about and if they knew they’d be amazed. And then eventually we meet someone who says, “You have a secret special skill.” And you’re like, “I know! So do you!” And they’re like, “I know!” And then you’re like, “We should eat pizza ice cream together.” And that’s what love is. It’s this giant mound of pizza-flavored ice cream and delusion
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.text: Ice cream is happiness condensed.
quotes.author: Jessie Lane Adams

quotes.text: Not having ice cream,” she proclaimed, “is the culmination of all disasters!
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.text:
Well, that’s because they’re wrong and I’m right. No more reading for you. Let’s go get some ice cream.”
“I don’t know if the kitchen has any,” Joel said. “It’s hard to get in the summers, and—”
“Not from the kitchen, stupid,” Melody said, rolling her eyes. “From the parlor out on Knight Street.”
“Oh. I’ve … never been there.”
“What! That’s a tragedy.”
“Melody, everything is a tragedy to you.”
“Not having ice cream,” she proclaimed, “is the culmination of all disasters! That’s it. No more discussion. We’re going. Follow.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.text:
You can describe me as a Ice cream!
I'm cold..
But, you know..
Ice cream is very sweet.
quotes.author: Hanako Ishii

quotes.text: Of course, that rationalization didn't work at all. It would have helped if I'd had some Oreo cookie ice cream to eat that the same time. I've learned that self-delusion is much easier when there's something sweet in your mouth.
quotes.author: Lee Goldberg

quotes.text: Women eat ice-cream, men toast marshmallows.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.text: Sometime all you need is love ... Oh wait! And ice cream, and chocolate to go along with it as nowadays love is anything but sweet.
quotes.author: Megha Khare

quotes.text: I had a dream about you. I licked your cone of ice cream. It was envelope flavored.
quotes.author: Melody Sohayegh

quotes.text:
A WATERY BLISS
As busy as an ice cream freezer,
On a Sunday getting hotter,
Happy is the honey eater-
The busy ocean otter,
Floating alongside Teter,
On a sea full of water.
quotes.author: Giorge Leedy

quotes.text: Damn. That was stupid, wasn't it? We nearly got killed over ice cream.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine

quotes.text: Eat Ice Cream. Read Books. Be Happy.
quotes.author: Carew Papritz

quotes.text: If I can't suck your milkshake through a straw, it's not a milkshake--it's a glass of ice cream.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.text: It's harder to hate someone when they like the same ice cream as you.
quotes.author: Shannon Wiersbitzky

quotes.text: Mandy smiled cheerfully at an overweight kid in a gold sweater and pink skirt who was chasing her little brother around along the boardwalk. When she was that age, on sunny days she’d be out on the boardwalk with Jud and Wendy, buying rainbow sorbet from the ice cream shop and placing paper boats into the harbour. She felt like a ghost, drifting past the shell of her own childhood.
quotes.author: Rebecca McNutt

quotes.text: Everyone likes ice cream," he said, white with rage. The mask of patience was slipping, and I don't know how I managed to hold back my tears. "Everyone except you, son, because you're a moron.
quotes.author: César Aira

quotes.text: Evelyn stared into the empty ice cream carton and wondered where the smiling girl in the school pictures had gone.
quotes.author: Fannie Flagg

quotes.text: I am not an ice cream come! I am a human being!
quotes.author: Louise Rennison

quotes.text: Do you want this ice cream?" he asked her, whisking the dish all around the tabletop. "I mean, do you truly want it? Would you fight for this ice cream? Would you bear a deep wound in order to possess this ice cream completely? How deep a wound? What if it was as deep as the grave? What does this ice cream really mean to you, Miss Cabrini?
quotes.author: Helen Oyeyemi

quotes.text: Darren played with the ice cream before raising a spoonful to his mouth. I watched him lick it before he wrapped his lips around the spoon, closing his eyelids and savoring the flavor on his tongue. He slowly withdrew the spoon from his mouth and opened his eyes. He smiled coyly at my rapt attention. I just wanted to reach across the table, grab a fistful of his hair and lick the ice cream right out of his mouth.
quotes.author: Alexis Woods

quotes.text: I can say with unwavering certitude that I have never started a pint of Ben 'n Jerry's ice cream that I didn't finish in its entirety within 6 minutes.
quotes.author: Gregor Collins

quotes.text: Here is a good joke. The little boy walks into an ice cream store, He asks for a sundae with extra hot fudge sauce. 'I'm sorry." says tje ice cream man. "Hot fudge only comes in one temperature." Mark, Florida
quotes.author: Susan Magsamen

quotes.text: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.text: Without pain, how could we know joy?' This is an old argument in the field of thinking about suffering and its stupidity and lack of sophistication could be plumbed for centuries but suffice it to say that the existence of broccoli does not, in any way, affect the taste of chocolate.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.text: Will looked horrified. "What kind of monster could possibly hate chocolate?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.text: Strength is the capacity to break a Hershey bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.text: Happiness. Simple as a glass of chocolate or tortuous as the heart. Bitter. Sweet. Alive.
quotes.author: Joanne Harris

quotes.text:
Don't wreck a sublime chocolate experience by feeling guilty.
Chocolate isn't like premarital sex. It will not make you pregnant.
And it always feels good.
quotes.author: Lora Brody

quotes.text:
Can I come back and see you sometime?"
"Long as you bring me some chocolate," Gramma said, and smiled. "I'm partial to chocolate."
"Gramma, you're diabetic."
"I'm old, girl. Gonna die of something. Might as well be chocolate.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine

quotes.text: Chocolate says "I'm sorry" so much better than words.
quotes.author: Rachel Vincent

quotes.text: Your hand and your mouth agreed many years ago that, as far as chocolate is concerned, there is no need to involve your brain.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: Anything is good if it's made of chocolate.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.text: Yes, boys are a little like shoes. Why? Well...They can be useful. But mainly...They are nice to look at. Getting the right one can be a lovely accessory to an outfit. There are times when you couldn't do without them. And there are times when you'd rather do without them. Get the wrong ones and they can hurt. There are many types and often the ones that look the nicest are completely unpractical.
quotes.author: Rachel Hill

quotes.text: He showed the words “chocolate cake” to a group of Americans and recorded their word associations. “Guilt” was the top response. If that strikes you as unexceptional, consider the response of French eaters to the same prompt: “celebration.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.text: Just the other day, I was in my neighborhood Starbucks, waiting for the post office to open. I was enjoying a chocolatey cafe mocha when it occurred to me that to drink a mocha is to gulp down the entire history of the New World. From the Spanish exportation of Aztec cacao, and the Dutch invention of the chemical process for making cocoa, on down to the capitalist empire of Hershey, PA, and the lifestyle marketing of Seattle's Starbucks, the modern mocha is a bittersweet concoction of imperialism, genocide, invention, and consumerism served with whipped cream on top.
quotes.author: Sarah Vowell

quotes.text: Look, there's no metaphysics on earth like chocolates.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.text: What you see before you, my friend, is the result of a lifetime of chocolate.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.text: If there's no chocolate in Heaven, I'm not going.
quotes.author: Jane Seabrook

quotes.text:
The End is Nigh!" the man shouted.
"Is there still time for hot chocolate?" Riley asked.
The-End-is-Nigh guy blinked. "Ah, maybe, I don’t know.
quotes.author: Jana Oliver

quotes.text: The greatest tragedies were written by the Greeks and Shakespeare...neither knew chocolate.
quotes.author: Sandra Boynton

quotes.text: Like magic, she felt him getting nearer, felt it like a pull in the pit of her stomach. It felt like hunger but deeper, heavier. Like the best kind of expectation. Ice cream expectation. Chocolate expectation.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.text: I was like a chocolate in a box, looking well behaved and perfect in place, all the while harboring a secret center.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.text: The 12-step chocolate program: NEVER BE MORE THAN 12 STEPS AWAY FROM CHOCOLATE!
quotes.author: Terry Moore

quotes.text:
Always serve too much hot fudge sauce on hot fudge sundaes.
It makes people overjoyed, and puts them in your debt.
quotes.author: Judith Olney

quotes.text: I listened wide-eyed, stupid. Glowing by her voice in the dim light. If chocolate was a sound, it would've been Constantine's voice singing. If singing was a color, it would've been the color of that chocolate.
quotes.author: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.text: Every now and then, I'll run into someone who claims not to like chocolate, and while we live in a country where everyone has the right to eat what they want, I want to say for the record that I don't trust these people, that I think something is wrong with them, and that they're probably - and this must be said - total duds in bed.
quotes.author: Steve Almond

quotes.text: Chemically speaking, chocolate really is the world's perfect food.
quotes.author: Michael Levine

quotes.text: As with most fine things, chocolate has its season. There is a simple memory aid that you can use to determine whether it is the correct time to order chocolate dishes: any month whose name contains the letter A, E, or U is the proper time for chocolate.
quotes.author: Sandra Boynton

quotes.text: Touched by her fingers, the two surviving chocolate people copulate desperately, losing themselves in a melting frenzy of lust, spending the last of their brief borrowed lives in a spasm of raspberry cream and fear.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: Coffee and chocolate—the inventor of mocha should be sainted.
quotes.author: Cherise Sinclair

quotes.text: Mentioning violence to Bruce was like mentioning chocolate sauce to a six-year-old.
quotes.author: Robert Muchamore

quotes.text: May your life be filled, as mine has been, with love and laughter; and remember, when things are rough all you need is ... Chocolate.
quotes.author: Geraldine Solon

quotes.text: It was like having a box of chocolates shut in the bedroom drawer. Until the box was empty it occupied the mind too much.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.text: Chocolate symbolizes, as does no other food, luxury, comfort, sensuality, gratification, and love.
quotes.author: Karl Petzke

quotes.text: I guess it goes to show that you just never know where life will take you. You search for answers. You wonder what it all means. You stumble, and you soar. And, if you’re lucky, you make it to Paris for a while.
quotes.author: Amy Thomas

quotes.text: Art arises from loss. I wish this weren't the case. I wish that every time I met a new woman and she rocked my world, I was inspired to write my ass off. But that is not what happens. What happens is we lie around in bed eating chocolate and screwing. Art is what happens when things don't work out, when you're licking your wounds. Art is, to a larger extent than people would like to think, a productive licking of the wounds.
quotes.author: Steve Almond

quotes.text: It was an indulgence, learning last words. Other people had chocolate; I had dying declarations.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.text: Chocolate is like my best friend and the most intense pleasure at the same time, perhaps not the most intense, but the most regular and reliable one.
quotes.author: Chloe Doutre-Roussel

quotes.text: When we don't have the words chocolate can speak volumes.
quotes.author: Joan Bauer

quotes.text: I'm pretty sure that eating chocolate keeps wrinkles away because I have never seen a 10 year old with a Hershey bar and crows feet.
quotes.author: Amy Neftzger

quotes.text:
The Duchess set about studying Annette and shortly found her adversary's tragic flaw.
Chocolate.
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.text:
Coraline opened the box of chocolates. The dog looked at them longingly.
"Would you like one?" she asked the little dog.
"Yes, please," whispered the dog. "Only not toffee ones. They make me drool."
"I thought chocolates weren't very good for dogs," she said, remembering something Miss Forcible had once told her.
"Maybe where you come from," whispered the little dog. "Here, it's all we eat.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: Remember the days when you let your child have some chocolate if he finished his cereal? Now, chocolate is one of the cereals.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.text: When I die,' I said to my friend, 'I'm not going to be embalmed. I'm going to be dipped.' Milk chocolate or bittersweet was the immediate concern.
quotes.author: Adrianne Marcus

quotes.text:
My cell rings. I answer it without looking at the caller ID.
"Hannah, I'm sorry." My voice is a moan.
"It's Ryan, actually.''
"Oh. Hey, Ryan." I grin.
"What'd you do to Hannah?"
I try to be evasive. "What are you talking about?"
"Uh-huh. Good try. What did you do?"
"She'll thank me for it one day."
"Oh man! It was that bad?"
"Will you relax? It is not bad."
"Is? Present tense? It's still going on?"
"Calm down, Ryan!"
"I have known you too long, Laurie Holbrook, to relax.
quotes.author: Erynn Mangum

quotes.text: Everyone needs fudge, Hildy. It's how God helps us cope.
quotes.author: Joan Bauer

quotes.text: Now she and I sit together in her room and eat chocolate, and I tell her that in a very long time when we both to go heaven, we should try to get chairs next to each other, close to the dessert table.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text:
What's this?" He brought the brown square to his nose.
"It smells musty."
"It's chocolate. You'll love it."
"That's what you said about Skittles. I vomited a rainbow afterward.
quotes.author: Melissa Landers

quotes.text:
My mouth is full of Oreo, ice cream, fudge, and Cool Whip, so I just nod.
This is heaven. I'm moving into one of their guest rooms.
So, Laur, do you want to come with us tomorrow? You can help me plan out furniture while Nick and Ryan dig for grubs,' she says, licking her fork.
Can we keep the rest of this dessert?"
She grins. 'Sure.'
Then I'll come.'
She watches me put another bite in my mouth and close my eyes.'You're pitiful.'
No, just a chocoholic.'
She shakes her head. 'Same thing.
quotes.author: Erynn Mangum

quotes.text:
Mooooon!” said the Ogre. “Tranquility …” Then he pointed at the full moon. “Neil Armstrong walked in a sea of Tranquility.” Then he added, “It’s made of cheese. But you have to take off the plastic before you put it on a burger.”
Mickey sighed.
“What’s his story?” the wraith asked.
“He’s chocolate,” Mikey said.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.text: Chocolate is a perfect food, as wholesome as it is delicious, a beneficent restorer of exhausted power...it is the best friend of those engaged in literary pursuits.
quotes.author: Justus von Liebig

quotes.text: You are trying to lure us into revealing information you're not entitled to? With chocolate and wine? Are you amateurs?
quotes.author: Moira J. Moore

quotes.text: Wanna be always Happy? Always carry some chocolate with you ;)
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.text:
If some confectioners were willing
To let the shape announce the filling,
We'd encounter fewer assorted chocs,
Bitten into and returned to the box.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.text: chocolate
quotes.author: Nicholas Reardon

quotes.text: There were some days that deserved to be drowned at birth and everyone sent back to bed with a hot brandy, a box of chocolates and a warm, energetic companion. Today was without question one of those days.
quotes.author: Diana Pharaoh Francis

quotes.text:
The greatest Emotion is Love.
The greatest quality is seeking to serve others.
The greatest gift is your own Life.
The greatest pleasure is CHOCOLATE!
The greatest thing you’ll ever learn is that there's always something new to learn.
The greatest virtue is temperance.
The greatest meditation is a peaceful mind.
The greatest practice is to be Kind.
education.
The greatest challenge is to let go. The greatest wisdom is to be in the NOW
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.text: Chocolate Love
quotes.author: Nicholas Reardon

quotes.text: Once Mo had closed the gates, he returned to his little stone hut, and his half-eaten sandwich of butter and canned sardines, and his mug of thick hot chocolate, which every night he poured carefully into a thermos labeled COFFEE.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.text: OK. Yoga position 99.
quotes.author: Nicholas Reardon

quotes.text: stealing chocolates
quotes.author: Nicholas Reardon

quotes.text: I drink to separate my body from my soul.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: There are those who love to get dirty and fix things. They drink coffee at dawn, beer after work. And those who stay clean, just appreciate things. At breakfast they have milk and juice at night. There are those who do both, they drink tea.
quotes.author: Gary Snyder

quotes.text:
What is your advice to young writers?” 
“Drink, fuck and smoke plenty of cigarettes.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: ...and you drink a little too much and try a little too hard. And you go home to a cold bed and think, 'That was fine'. And your life is a long line of fine.
quotes.author: Gillian Flynn

quotes.text: Wealth is like sea-water; the more we drink, the thirstier we become; and the same is true of fame.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: I'm gonna party, see how intoxicated I can get and how many rules I can flaunt. That's my motto.
quotes.author: H.G. Bissinger

quotes.text: Why does man kill? He kills for food. And not only food: Frequently there must be a beverage.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: Drunken men give some of the best pep talks.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: Come on, gentleman; let us drink to our stupidity.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.text: Maybe some folks are alcoholics and others are just voluntary drunks. Maybe some folks drink due to body chemistry and others due to their lazy characters. Maybe some have drinking problems, while others have problems enough to drink.
quotes.author: George Jones

quotes.text: Unfortunately, he still hadn’t asked for my number, or a date, or my hand in marriage, and my drink was getting low.
quotes.author: Kimberly Novosel

quotes.text: Think champagne, drink champagne!
quotes.author: Ellen Dean

quotes.text: I'm too drunk to recall much of what I've said. Which, come to think of it, is probably just as well, judging by the way people who are normally quite sensible dissolve into gibbering, rude, opinionated and bombastic idiots once the alcohol molecules in their bloom-stream outnumber the neutrons, or whatever. Luckily, one only notices this if one stays sober oneself, so the solution is as pleasant (at the time, at least) as it is obvious.
quotes.author: Iain Banks

quotes.text: Drinking tea with a pinch of imagination!
quotes.author: 50 Ways to Drink Tea

quotes.text: For more than three decades, coffee has captured my imagination because it is a beverage about individuals as well as community. A Rwandan farmer. Eighty roast masters at six Starbucks plants on two continents. Thousands of baristas in 54 countries. Like a symphony, coffee's power rests in the hands of a few individuals who orchestrate its appeal. So much can go wrong during the journey from soil to cup that when everything goes right, it is nothing short of brilliant! After all, coffee doesn't lie. It can't. Every sip is proof of the artistry -- technical as well as human -- that went into its creation.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: A drink centers me but I usually make myself wait until at least 9:00 PM for that. Or 8:00 PM. Whichever comes first.
quotes.author: Bill Callahan

quotes.text: H. L Mencken's Dictionary of the American Language supplies a long list of slang terms for being drunk, but the Irish are no slouches, either. They're spannered, rat-arsed, cabbaged, and hammered; ruined, legless, scorched, and blottoed; or simply trolleyed or sloshed. In Kerry, you're said to be flamin'; in Waterford, you're in the horrors; and in Cavan, you've gone baloobas, a tough one to wrap your tongue around if you ARE baloobas. In Donegal, you're steamin', while the afflicted in Limerick are out of their tree.
quotes.author: Bill Barich

quotes.text: I beg your pardon; I am drunk without a drink. English wine & words are vulnerable to every man.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.text: Liquor is the kiss of the angels as well as the curse of the devil. It can conceal but also can reveal
quotes.author: Thrity Umrigar

quotes.text: Ive created a new drink! I'm calling it the Piñata Colada! Its sweet and tasty, but when you wake up the next morning your head feels like its been hitten with a stick.
quotes.author: José N. Harris

quotes.text: The devil lives in a double-shot", Roman explains himself obscurely. "I got a great worm inside. Gnaws and gnaws. Every day I drown him and every day he gnaws. Help me drown the worm, fellas.
quotes.author: Nelson Algren

quotes.text: Partying means drinking. It also means playing records by Lou Reed and Chicago, which I thought was a city but is also a band it turns out.
quotes.author: Ron Currie Jr.

quotes.text: Claret is the liquor for boys; port for men; but he who aspires to be a hero must drink brandy.
quotes.author: Samuel Jackson

quotes.text: Sam took another sip of the pruno. It went down smoother this time, possibly because he no longer had feeling in his extremities.
quotes.author: Tod Goldberg

quotes.text: How would that premise stand up if he examined it? That was probably why the Communists were always cracking down on Bohemiansism. When you were drunk or when you committed adultery you recognised your own personal fallability of that so mutable substitute for the apostles' creed, the party line. Down with Bohemianism, the sin of Majakowski.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text:
There were, however, a few exceptions.
One was Norma Dodsworth, the poet, who had not unpleasantly drunk but had been sensible enough to pass out before any violent action proved necessary. He had been deposited, not very gently, on the lawn, where it was hoped that a hyena would give him a rude awakening. For all practical purposes he could, therefore, be regarded as absent.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.text: Life is this simple ~ birth, eat, drink, play, explore, and relate to family and friends; be happy and enjoy life…!
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.text: I general brzo isprazni čašu. Jer kamo razuman čovjek može pobjeći kad ne može vjerovati u svoj razum? Bolje biti pijan nego lud.
quotes.author: Karen Blixen

quotes.text: Colter searched for original Mexican tiles to use as patterns for copies, and during the search, a barrel of old tile letters was found in a cellar corner. She decided to use the letters on the walls of the Cocina Cantina to spell out old Spanish proverbs about eating and drinking. Above the bar was "A vuestra salud" [to your health], and in another room, "Not with whom you were born, but with whom you pasture.
quotes.author: Virginia L. Grattan

quotes.text: Well, I may get drunk," the Widow admitted, "but I don't stagger. Sometimes I fall down. But I don't stagger.
quotes.author: Nelson Algren

quotes.text: A fine single malt whisky, of course, is purely medicinal - it cures all manner of ailments one may care to imagine.
quotes.author: Alex Morritt

quotes.text:
When you cannot feel,
The purity of love, 
The tenderness of beauty, 
The drinkability of wine, 
The simplicity of a smile, 
You have to go back and drink coffee
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.text: Drink in the moon as though you might die of thirst.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.text:
I find myself drunk in the streets again.
A glass of wine and so my thoughts begin.
I smile at passersby to and fro,
Faces like blank slates minutes ago,
Now emotions readily painted on canvases:
Grief, despair, joy, and madnesses.
At this time, the clouds are sweating sweet water
And you can smell the scent of each corner:
Fish, dirt, rotten apples, and burning tires.
Close your eyes here to smell all your heart desires.
Everything is more colourful when you're not yourself.
So long as you’re sound body and mind, you have your wealth.
I am now treading almost fleeting.
Birds singing, bicycle bells ringing.
I have lost my way but not my heart.
Have my head, those two are apart.
Take care dear city, I must soon head home.
Until tomorrow evening when again I will roam.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.text:
I really hate that I need my glasses while using my laptop. What I hate even more is that I need those glasses to be full of vodka at all times.
-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz
quotes.author: Karen Quan

quotes.text: O Heavenly Children, do not forget that God is here, there and everywhere. The birds are his eyes and the air is his ears. And as you sleep, your heart and soul rest naked before him. He can drink from the rivers of your thoughts, and even feel the wetness of your tears.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.text:
It's super cloudy right now but I think I can see the northern lights from my room. Another observation: Every light is a strobe light, if you just blink fast enough, and drink enough vodka.
-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz
quotes.author: Karen Quan

quotes.text: Nobody lives forever, nobody stays young long enough. My past seemed like so much excess baggage, my future a series of long goodbyes, my present an empty flask, the last good drink already bitter on my tongue.
quotes.author: James Crumley

quotes.text: That was how I met her, in a bar in Saint-Germain-des-Prés, she was drinking and watching, and that was why I liked her, I thought she would be fun to have fun with.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.text: Depression and Drama. What a Deadly Drink to Give to My Suicidal Spirit.
quotes.author: Michaela Johanna Seabrooke

quotes.text:
I dreamt that ‪@mark_wahlberg‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬ and his wife were our neighbors and we had dance parties in our living room and drank wine from solo cups. Everyone said I danced like I was doing parkour, and everyone laughed, until I fell off the roof and broke my neck.
-Crystal Woods and Jarod Kintz
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.text: When water fountains start charging to drink, then you know we have a problem.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.text: Love is like wine, drink it as you rhyme.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.text:
On un-being in an imaginary real ‘lationship:
When you relive, the past, unkind,
you cannot see - you're simply blind.
Emotions - ages take to settle,
and love is fiercer than a kettle.
And in the desert, late at night
Your friends, you get to bite
The laws - they force you to a fight
The stone to glass turns - what a sight
At times I sit, and sit, and think.
What could be better than a drink?
The answer, I think, is a link...
To just one woman - just her wink.
It hurts when it hurts,
but the aching will pass.
At some point, it deserts,
all the hearts, of bent glass.
quotes.author: Will Advise

quotes.text: There is no cleverness in driving. No is wisdom or experience driver or driving that will save you from accidents. Because you know how to drive it doesn't mean someone who doesn't know how to drive or who drives reckless cant hit your car. A car is a moving coffin. Always be thankful when you reach your destination . Those who die from accidents are not stupids or bad drivers. Always thank God for sparing your life and delivering you to your destination.
quotes.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quotes.text: I went to the Hotel of the Violet Hippopotamus and drank five glasses of good wine.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.text: What’s your poison or should I just waste my money by guessing something you probably won’t even drink? I’d much rather get you something you like.
quotes.author: Jason Medina

quotes.text: But I drink differently than they do. They drink to take the edge off. I drink to disappear.
quotes.author: Glennon Doyle Melton

quotes.text: Have rum; I mean, have fun. Don't overdose. Cheers.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.text:
Movies aren't scare, they are part of the scary stuff. But the scary thing is the truth, what more scary than that??
What will happen if you understand what you eat now, what you drink?? You get disadvantages??
...
You don't want to make you look negative side, do you?
quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.text: It is childish to eat primarily or only to please your tongue.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.text: Never drink with Dornishmen when the moon is full.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.text: Even God does not call every human a man. There are some who have not managed to attain the height of those who God refers to as men. They might be giving birth, eating and drinking, having fun, but yet, when they don’t live for what they were created for, they remain biomasses.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.text: We go down the hall again, thank heaven, to my drink.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.text: Just by doing what rich do... can make you also rich... Rich drink coca-cola so you can too!
quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.text:
It is dull, Son of Adam, to drink without eating," said the Queen presently. "What would you like best to eat?"
"Turkish Delight, please, your Majesty," said Edmund.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: She didn't want to alienate herself from the very wealthy man that was about to offer her a job by declining the polite offer of a drink.
quotes.author: S.A. Tawks

quotes.text: The breeze across the desert as the light died was so sweet she could almost drink it.
quotes.author: Mike Bond

quotes.text:
I have become intoxicated again.
You are such a potent wine, my friend.
To escape your withdrawal effects,
tomorrow I will drink in excess.
Alas, why make me love?
I was aware, conscious, and sensible before.
I am ill by cause of this illusion.
The devil plays tricks on me more and more.
I was a harp you immaculately plucked at will.
Your score, the nightingale song within
notes composed to imprison and bear me wings.
Oh, if only they could hear how it sings!
I am now beyond parched.
My strings left untouched.
You are no longer an oasis, my friend,
but a mirage soon coming to an end.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.text: Tea is my best drink.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.text: SPIT ALL OVER SOMEONE WITH A MOUTHFUL OF MILK IF YOU WANT TO FIND OUT SOMETHING ABOUT THEIR PERSONALITY FAST.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.text: The human body has no more need for cows' milk than it does for dogs' milk, horses' milk, or giraffes' milk.
quotes.author: Michael Klaper

quotes.text: I am the kid who sticks her finger in the light socket. I am the person who doesn't check the expiration date on the milk. I am the idiot who has never looked before she leaped. I am the girl who is falling apart, right now.
quotes.author: Amy Garvey

quotes.text: Every time you drink a glass of milk or eat a piece of cheese, you harm a mother. Please go vegan.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.text: The cow is of the bovine ilk; one end is moo, the other milk.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.text:
Then what's a synonym for woman?"
"Entrails."
"You're not very poetic, are you? Well, then, what's the antonym for entrails?"
"Milk.
quotes.author: Osamu Dazai

quotes.text:
When the young woman
leans over the sky,
about to water the flowers as well as the weeds,
her white front splits open
until her milk runs.
quotes.author: Günter Grass

quotes.text: The distinction between meat and other animal products is total nonsense. Vegetarianism is a morally incoherent position. If you regard animals as members of the moral community, you really don’t have a choice but to go vegan.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.text: He just wanted to stand close to her, touch her hair that was white as glacier milk...
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.text: Blood was flowing – in Bluebeard’s house, in the abattoirs, in the circuses where God had set his seal to whiten the windows. Blood and Milk flowed together.
quotes.author: Arthur Rimbaud

quotes.text: like a drop of ink in a glass of milk
quotes.author: Thrity Umrigar

quotes.text: Thou askest me to take things seriously? After what thou didst last night? When thou needest to kill a man and instead did what you did? You were supposed to kill one, not make one! When we have just seen the sky full of airplanes of a quantity to kill us back to our grandfathers and forward to all unborn grandsons including all cats, goats and bedbugs. Airplanes making a noise to curdle the milk in your mother's breasts as they pass over darkening the sky and roaring like lions and you ask me to take things seriously. I take them too seriously already.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: But raw milk from a Jersey cow is a totally different substance from what I'd thought of as milk. If you do not own a cow or know someone who owns a cow, I must caution you never to try raw milk straight from the teat of a Jersey cow, because it would be cruel to taste it once and not have access to it again. Only a few people in America remeber this type of milk now, elderly people mostly, who grew up with a cow. They come to the farm sometimes, looking for that taste from their childhood.
quotes.author: Kristin Kimball

quotes.text: So it happened at last: I was about to become a thief, a cheap milk-stealer. Here was your lash-in-the-pen genius, your one story-writer: a thief.
quotes.author: John Fante

quotes.text:
The white saucer like some full moon descends
At last from the clouds of the table above;
She sighs and dreams and thrills and glows,
Transfigured with love.
She nestles over the shining rim,
Buries her chin in the creamy sea;
Her tail hangs loose; each drowsy paw
Is doubled under each bending knee.
A long, dim ecstasy holds her life;
Her world is an infinite shapeless white,
Till her tongue has curled the last holy drop,
Then she sinks back into the night,
Draws and dips her body to heap
Her sleepy nerves in the great arm-chair,
Lies defeated and buried deep
Three or four hours unconscious there.
quotes.author: Harold Monro

quotes.text: His life changed history. His courage changed lives.
quotes.author: Liz Farrelly

quotes.text: They're going to drown me in milk--what a waste of good baby-food!
quotes.author: William Moulton Marston

quotes.text: Everything gets better with milk.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.text: A woman's body is a sacred temple. A work of art, and a life-giving vessel. And once she becomes a mother, her body serves as a medicine cabinet for her infant. From her milk she can nourish and heal her own child from a variety of ailments. And though women come in a wide assortment as vast as the many different types of flowers and birds, she is to reflect divinity in her essence, care and wisdom. God created a woman's heart to be a river of love, not to become a killing machine.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.text: Don't lose your time gazing at the spilled milk. There are other cows to milk
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.text: The ideas flow like milk and honey in my land, my mind.
quotes.author: T.S. Wright

quotes.text: When a course of action is forced upon you it’s best to accept it with grace and milk it for whatever you can get, right up to the moment the first opportunity to weasel out of the deal presents itself.
quotes.author: Mark Lawrence

quotes.text: I felt like I’d just discovered my last big glass of milk had actually come from a bull.
quotes.author: Ari Marmell

quotes.text: She stared into her coffee, sitting in a thin blue dress that tangled in her calves. She often felt that she chased the ideal cup of coffee in her mind from table to table, the rich, thick, creamy coffee, spicy, bittersweet, that betrayed no hint of thinness or chemical flavoring, nothing less than total, fathomless devotion to the state of being itself. Every morning she pulled a delicate cup from its brass hook and filled it, hoping that it would be dark and deep and secret as a forest, and each morning it cooled too fast, had too much milk, stained the cup, made her nervous.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.text: When I realized that my home was completely filled with a biologically toxic radio wave field, I decided that the best route forward was to milk the home for all of the biological research that I could possibly produce from it!
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.text:
You ate the cookies and drank all the milk?” Cash asked, looking at the base of the tree.
“No. I didn’t. Why would I? I don’t like banana chip, they’re your favorite.”
“I didn’t eat them, Harper.”
“Sure you didn’t.”
“Prove it then.” 
“How?
quotes.author: Shaye Evans

quotes.text:
Take this wine glass for example. If I had poured milk into it and told you it was wine, would you be upset when you took the first sip, expecting the bite of fermented grapes and getting milk instead?”
“I like milk.”
Everett fought a smile. “I do too. But I also like to know what’s coming. It all boils down to control.
quotes.author: Whitney Barbetti

quotes.text: But you know what they say - old milk turns sour but old scores just get sweeter.
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie

quotes.text: There are 100 ways to react to spilled milk. Your chance to show love.
quotes.author: Dr Margaret Aranda

quotes.text: Milk is the only juice in a world of cows.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.text:
I'll be fine. Maybe I should make up a magic milk bath with the Golden Fruit, huh?" I laughed.
Kishan considered and grinned. "A giant bowlful of milk with you in the middle might be a little too much for us cats to resist.
quotes.author: Colleen Houck

quotes.text: The only time I drink milk is when I drink coffee. I make love the same way—contributing 2% as I just sort of lay there.
quotes.author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quotes.text:
No milk," I said.
"No milk," said my sister.
I watched my dad think about this. He looked like he was going to suggest that we have something for breakfast that you do not need milk for, like sausages, but then he looked like he remembered that, without milk, he couldn't have his tea. He had his "no tea" face.
"You poor children," he said. "I will walk down to the shop on the corner. I will get milk.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: I drank my bottle of milk and ate my morsel of bread somewhere on the outskirts, while I circumspectly studied my environment or else fell to meditating on my own harsh lot.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.text: More fun than a frog in a glass of milk.
quotes.author: Bob Weir

quotes.text: I'll tend to her as no mother ever tended a child, a daughter. Nobody will ever get my milk no more except my own children. I never had to give it to nobody else--and the one time I did it was took from me--they held me down and took it. Milk that belonged to my baby.... I know what it is to be without the milk that belongs to you; to have to fight and holler for it, and to have so little left.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.text: I hate milk. Coats your throat as bad as okra. Something just downright disgusting about it.
quotes.author: Marsha Norman

quotes.text: A cheese may disappoint. It may be dull, it may be naive, it may be oversophisticated. Yet it remains cheese, milk's leap toward immortality.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.text: One fact is beyond dispute: Homogenization prevents the consumer from realizing just how little fat is contained in modern processed milk, even "full fat" milk. Before homogenization, milk purchasers looked for milk that had lots of cream - that was the sign that the milk came from healthy cows, cows on pasture. Old-fashioned milk contained from 4 to 8 percent butterfat, which translated into lots of cream on the top. Modern milk is standardize at 3.5 percent, no more. Butterfat brings bigger profits to the dairy industry as butter or as an ingredient in ice cream than as a component of liquid milk. The consumer has been cheated, but with homogenization, he can't tell.
quotes.author: Ron Schmid

quotes.text: Lactose intolerant milk?! KISS, MY, DICK!
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: There are three reasons for breast-feeding: the milk is always at the right temperature; it comes in attractive containers; and the cat can't get it.
quotes.author: Irena Chalmers

quotes.text: That is how politics work; if you don’t drink wine they will consider to bring you milk.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.text: Debbie alikuwa akimwangalia Murphy kama paka anavyoangalia maziwa.
quotes.author: Enock Maregesi

quotes.text:
What do you want?"
"Just coffee. Black - like my soul.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.text: As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.text: I'd rather take coffee than compliments just now.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.text: It is inhumane, in my opinion, to force people who have a genuine medical need for coffee to wait in line behind people who apparently view it as some kind of recreational activity.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: والقهوة يجب أن يقدّمها لك شخصٌ ما. القهوةُ كالوَرْد، فالورد يقدّمه لك سِواك، ولا أحدَ يقدّم ورداً لنفسه. وإن أعددتها لنفسك فأنت لحظتها في عزلة حرة بلا عاشق أو عزيز، غريبٌ في مكانك. وإن كان هذا اختياراً فأنت تدفع ثمن حريتك، وإن كان اضطراراً فأنت في حاجةٍ إلى جرس الباب.
quotes.author: مريد البرغوثي

quotes.text: Coffee is a way of stealing time that should by rights belong to your older self.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: Let me wake up next to you, have coffee in the morning and wander through the city with your hand in mine, and I'll be happy for the rest of my fucked up little life.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.text: Black as night, sweet as sin.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: Just the other day, I was in my neighborhood Starbucks, waiting for the post office to open. I was enjoying a chocolatey cafe mocha when it occurred to me that to drink a mocha is to gulp down the entire history of the New World. From the Spanish exportation of Aztec cacao, and the Dutch invention of the chemical process for making cocoa, on down to the capitalist empire of Hershey, PA, and the lifestyle marketing of Seattle's Starbucks, the modern mocha is a bittersweet concoction of imperialism, genocide, invention, and consumerism served with whipped cream on top.
quotes.author: Sarah Vowell

quotes.text: I don't really like coffee, she said, but I don't really like it when my head hits my desk when I fall asleep either.
quotes.author: Brian Andreas

quotes.text: Even bad coffee is better than no coffee at all.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.text: Adventure in life is good; consistency in coffee even better.
quotes.author: Justina Chen

quotes.text:
Police work wouldn't be possible without coffee," Wallander said.
"No work would be possible without coffee."
They pondered the importance of coffee in silence.
quotes.author: Henning Mankell

quotes.text: There are those who love to get dirty and fix things. They drink coffee at dawn, beer after work. And those who stay clean, just appreciate things. At breakfast they have milk and juice at night. There are those who do both, they drink tea.
quotes.author: Gary Snyder

quotes.text: It's just like when you've got some coffee that's too black, which means it's too strong. What do you do? You integrate it with cream, you make it weak. But if you pour too much cream in it, you won't even know you ever had coffee. It used to be hot, it becomes cool. It used to be strong, it becomes weak. It used to wake you up, now it puts you to sleep.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: Mercy," he mumbled. "What the hell did you do to my French Roast?
quotes.author: Patricia Briggs

quotes.text: Come on, don't you ever stop and smell the coffee?
quotes.author: Justina Chen

quotes.text: It doesn't matter where you're from - or how you feel... There's always peace in a strong cup of coffee.
quotes.author: Gabriel Bá

quotes.text:
Want coffee?" I asked, as I headed that way.
"It's three thirty in the morning."
"Okay. Want coffee?
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.text: Only an idiot would rely on the energy of a bean or a leaf to stay awake throughout the day.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.text: Coffee first. Schemes later.
quotes.author: Leanna Renee Hieber

quotes.text: Do you know how helpless you feel if you have a full cup of coffee in your hand and you start to sneeze?
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.text: I like my coffee black, my beer from Germany, wine from Burgundy, the darker, the better. I like my heroes complicated and brooding, James Dean in oiled leather, leaning on a motorcycle. You know the color. ("Ode to Chocolate")
quotes.author: Barbara Crooker

quotes.text: Coffee and chocolate—the inventor of mocha should be sainted.
quotes.author: Cherise Sinclair

quotes.text: Life’s too short to drink crappy coffee and cry over boys who don’t care.
quotes.author: Matty Healy

quotes.text:
What the hell makes you smart?" I asked.
"I wouldn't go for coffee with you."
"Listen - I wouldn't ask you."
"That," she replied, "is what makes you stupid.
quotes.author: Erich Segal

quotes.text:
I brought you some coffee.” he held out the cup but she waved it away.
“I hate that stuff. It tastes like feet.”
At that he smiled. “How would you know what feet taste like?”
“I just know.”
-Luke and Clary, pg.209-
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.text: A morning coffee is my favorite way of starting the day, settling the nerves so that they don't later fray.
quotes.author: Marcia Carrington

quotes.text:
The next thing I remembered was Reyes smiling down at me as the sun filtered into his apartment, his hair mussed, his lids hooded with the thick remnants of sleep. I stretched as those three little words that every girl longs to hear slipped from his mouth with effortless ease. As though they did every day. As though they didn't mean the world to me.
With one corner of his mouth tipping sensually, he asked, "Want some coffee?"
And I fell.
I fell hard.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.text: The morning cup of coffee has an exhilaration about it which the cheering influence of the afternoon or evening cup of tea cannot be expected to reproduce.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.text: No matter what historians claimed, BC really stood for "Before Coffee.
quotes.author: Cherise Sinclair

quotes.text:
6 months, 2 weeks, 4 days,
and I still don’t know which month it was then
or what day it is now.
Blurred out lines
from hangovers 
to coffee
Another vagabond 
lost to love.
4am alone and on my way.
These are my finest moments.
I scrub my skin
to rid me from 
you
and I still don’t know why I cried.
It was just something in the way you took my heart and rearranged my insides and I couldn’t recognise the emptiness you left me with when you were done. Maybe you thought my insides would fit better this way, look better this way, to you and us and all the rest.
But then you must have changed your mind
or made a wrong
because why did you
leave?
6 months, 2 weeks, 4 days,
and I still don’t know which month it was then
or what day it is now.
I replace cafés with crowded bars and empty roads with broken bottles
and this town is healing me slowly but still not slow or fast enough because there’s no right way to do this.
There is no right way to do this.
There is no right way to do this.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.text: This is like a cookie, it tastes like a cookie having sex with a doughnut.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.text: I like my coffee with cream and my literature with optimism.
quotes.author: Abigail Reynolds

quotes.text: Who shall I shoot? You choose. Now, listen very carefully: where's your coffee? You've got coffee, haven't you? C'mon, everyone's got coffee! Spill the beans!
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: There are three intolerable things in life - cold coffee, lukewarm champagne, and overexcited women...
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: Just coffee. Black—like my soul.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.text: The powers of a man's mind are directly proportioned to the quantity of coffee he drinks.
quotes.author: James Mackintosh

quotes.text:
Wait!"
What?" I lowered my cup hastily, wondering if maybe there was a stray hair, or worse, a newly boiled bug inside my cup.
You got to smell it first. It's the proper way to cup coffee."
Cup coffee?"
Taste it."
What? Are you the coffee police or something?
quotes.author: Justina Chen

quotes.text:
You wanna-I dunno-get coffee or something sometime?"
Justin smiled "Not coffee. But yes."
"Not Coffee it is, then."
"Yes, Not Coffee.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.text: I sipped my own coffee, heavy on the sugar and cream, trying to make up for the late work the night before. Caffeine and sugar, the two basic food groups.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.text: I don't know where my ideas come from. I will admit, however, that one key ingredient is caffeine. I get a couple cups of coffee into me and weird things just start to happen.
quotes.author: Gary Larson

quotes.text: Pretending to drink coffee was similar to faking an orgasm.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.text:
But there are people who take salt with their coffee. They say it gives a tang, a savour, which is peculiar and fascinating. In the same way there are certain places, surrounded by a halo of romance, to which the inevitable disillusionment you experience on seeing them gives a singular spice. You had expected something wholly beautiful and you get an impression which is infinitely more complicated than any that beauty can give you.
